resources.string: CREATE TABLE history(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, fetched INTEGER, transmitted INTEGER, observed INTEGER, latitude REAL, longitude REAL, altitude REAL, bearing REAL, speed REAL, provider TEXT, location_timestamp INTEGER, accuracy REAL);
ALTER TABLE history ADD mock_locations_enabled INTEGER;
ALTER TABLE history ADD mock_location_apps_count INTEGER;
ALTER TABLE history ADD mock_location_apps TEXT;
ALTER TABLE history ADD mock_location_provider INTEGER;

CREATE TABLE open_weather_history(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, fetched INTEGER, transmitted INTEGER, observed INTEGER, latitude REAL, longitude REAL, timezone TEXT, temperature REAL, apparent_temperature REAL, humidity REAL, dew_point REAL, wind_speed REAL, wind_gust_speed REAL, wind_bearing REAL, cloud_cover REAL, uv_index REAL, air_pressure REAL, visibility REAL, full_reading TEXT);

CREATE TABLE history(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, fetched INTEGER, transmitted INTEGER, observed INTEGER, current_place_latitude REAL, current_place_longitude REAL, current_place_types TEXT, current_place_confidence REAL);
